description: Defines a Flutter widget named ScoreBar that displays current and best scores with Ocean-themed styling, including internal components like _ScorePill for individual score display.

classes.name: ScoreBar
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays the current score and best score with themed styling, subscribing to GameProvider for data.

classes.name: _ScorePill
classes.description: A private StatelessWidget representing an individual score display pill with label and value, styled according to the theme.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for ScoreBar and _ScorePill, reflecting current scores and styling accordingly.
